archimate:BusinessService.name: Credit Management
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
A corporate loan is presented for credit management pricing decisioning prior to completion of the offer process
General comment:
This service domain supports a central bank credit management function that supports a credit perspective across all bank activity. Transactions can be repriced to factor in the credit perspective
Business Purpose : A bank-wide function to qualify credit pricing for offered products and services to reflect the bank's appetite to write the business (overrides the standard product pricing procedure)
Пример использования:
Корпоративный кредит предоставляется для принятия решения о ценообразовании кредитного менеджмента до завершения процесса предложения
Общее замечание:
Этот домен услуг поддерживает функцию управления кредитами Центрального банка, которая поддерживает кредитную перспективу во всей банковской деятельности. Сделки могут быть переоценены с учетом кредитной перспективы
деловая цель : Общебанковская функция для квалификации кредитного ценообразования для предлагаемых продуктов и услуг, чтобы отразить аппетит банка, чтобы написать бизнес (переопределяет стандартную процедуру ценообразования продукта)
Service Domain - Credit Management This service domain supports a central bank credit management function that maintains an overarching credit perspective across all bank activity. Transactions can be re-priced to factor in this credit perspective.
Detailed Summary This service domain provides a bank-wide/oversight function to qualify credit pricing for offered products and services to reflect the bank's appetite to write the business. This decision can override the standard product pricing procedure.
Executive Summary This service domain provides a bank-wide/oversight function to qualify credit pricing for offered products and services to reflect the bank's appetite to write the business. This decision can override the standard product pricing procedure
Examples Of Use A corporate loan is presented for credit management pricing decisioning prior to completion of the offer process
